file_content.text: May the Force go with you, friend.
Hmm. It would appear Master Ostar-Gal sees something special in you. Let us speak of the two paths ahead.
The time has come to choose. But be sure of your decision.
I will become a Jedi Sage.
Then begin your journey anew as a Jedi Sage. Be a guide and protector, and may the Force be with you.
I will become a Jedi Shadow.
Then join the ranks of the Jedi Shadows. Be a light in the darkness, and may the Force be with you.
I need more time to decide.
I'm afraid I have nothing to offer you.
First, the path of the Jedi Sage. Such Jedi dedicate themselves to the healing arts of the Force, and ways to defend the innocent.
But, they must also defend themselves. A Jedi Sage can confuse an opponent's mind, or use telekinesis to stop him in his tracks.
An interesting path....
A master of Force techniques.
What of the second path?
The second is the path of the Jedi Shadow, the covert investigators and defenders of our order. Jedi Shadows wield a double-bladed lightsaber.
A Shadow can disappear from sight, to observe or make devastating sneak attacks. Shadows may also shield themselves and protect their allies when stealth and diplomacy are no longer options.
A path I could follow.
Don't they risk the dark side?
Don't be concerned. Jedi Shadows are highly respected. Their stealth talents are used to end threats quickly, and ensure injustice is brought to light.
One who fights with stealth.
Once you decide which path you will take, your destiny is set. It cannot be undone.
